FuncDef:
The ip-address command sets the IP address of the entity.
The undo ip-address command deletes the IP address of the entity.
By default, no IP address exists for the entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the IP address of the entity.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To describe an entity, configure an IP address for the entity.
